Hi! I'm John, an aspiring Computer Engineer. I live in Barangay Dalig, Antipolo City, here in the Philippines. I started my career in Computer Engineering as a student at "Polytechnic University of the Philippines" and since then, I've been working on things related to technology. I have a passion for engineering, programming, and creating websites that help people succeed in their dreams.
